parameters.highest_order: highest order of scattering to calculate
parameters.step_size: step this number of range bins between ms computations
parameters.particle_info_source: measured or constant---measured uses measured mode diameters and takes particle parameters from particle_parameters.json
parameters.processing_mode: 1d  or 2d,  produce 1d average profile, produce both 1d and full 2d multiple scatter results
parameters.mode_diameter_water: mode diameter of cloud water droplets (m)
parameters.p180_ice: ice crystal backscatter phase function, used to generate beta_a via beta_a_backscat/p180_ice
parameters.h2o_depol_threshold: linear depolarization threshold, linear_depol<threshold identified as liquid
parameters.alpha_water: size distribution shape parameter alpha for liquid
parameters.g_water: size distribution parameter g for liquid
parameters.alpha_ice: size distribution shape parameter alpha for ice
parameters.g_ice: size distribution parameter g for ice
parameters.second_wavelength: None or wavelength (m) for second multiple scatter calculation
